item.description:
Tired of the cold? Join us at KNOX's 75° and party like it's summertime!

MORE PLANTS, MORE ANIMALS
On March 1, we will be transforming our greenhouse into a beautifully lighted, exotic rainforest. Enjoy the sights, sounds, and flavors of the tropics while you shake off those winter chills with the music of DJ Joe E. The party kicks off at 7pm!

Featuring:
- Delicious food
- FREE beer and wine (food and drinks included with cost of admission)
- Tropical atmosphere
- Music by DJ Joe E
- Silent auction
- Surprises to come!

$20 in advance
$25 at the door
Members call for a special discount
You may purchase tickets at www.knoxparks.org or by calling 860-951-7694.

The more the merrier- bring your friends! Free on-site parking is available.

--

75° supports KNOX's mission to build stronger, greener, and more beautiful neighborhoods in Hartford. Working with residents, businesses and local government we facilitate:
• Tree plantings and public landscaping projects
• Urban beautification through Hartford Blooms pots and graffiti removal
• Community gardens to support local food harvest
• Youth development training
For more information, visit our website: www.knoxparks.org
item.name: 75°, An Urban Greenhouse Party
